metadata.title: CVE-2016-3099 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: mod_ns in Red Hat Enterprise Linux Desktop 7, Red Hat Enterprise Linux HPCNode 7, Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server 7, and Red Hat Enterprise LinuxWorkstation 7 allows remote attackers to force the use of ciphers that werenot intended to be enabled.

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-nss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
